general.gigTitle: fix, design and develop websites for you in html and php

sellerCard.oneLiner: Need your project completed efficiently? I am just a message away!
sellerCard.description:
Hi there!

I'm Hamza, a full-stack web developer with over 8 years of experience in both front-end and back-end technologies. My expertise spans HTML, PHP, WordPress, ERP systems, Custom Development and UI/UX design, allowing me to offer comprehensive solutions for your project needs.

Need your project completed quickly and professionally? I'm just a message away!

Looking forward to collaborating with you.

Thanks!

description.content:
I am a full-stack web developer with over 5 yeas of experience.

I can design and develop websites in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL and Bootstrap.



Why me? because I

  • Can secure and protect your website from malicious activities
  • Worked in many frontend and backend frameworks e.g. Bootstrap, jQuery, CodeIgniter and Laravel
  • Rewrite URLs using .htaccess (redirect, pretty URLs, security etc.)
  • Debug and fix website issues regarding functionality, UI and responsive,ess
  • Provide revisions up to customer's satisfaction



Other specialties are:

  • PHP/MySQL dynamic web development
  • Dashboard and portals creation
  • Hands-on experience in WordPress 
  • Experience in using tools of WHM and cPanel
  • Building wireframes and mockups
  • SMTP end-to-end encrypted secure emails using SSL/TLS.



Tools and technologies I work:

DataTables, AJAX, JSON, Payment integration, WordPress, theme development, PHPMyAdmin, Database, CRUD generator, Email configurations, 3rd party API integrations, PHPMailer, Social media integrations, Google Analytics.


Special discounts for special customers and long-term projects


Am I offline? just send me a message with the requirements and I will reply you as soon as I get online.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have domain and hosting. Can you provide that?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I will provide domain and hosting at most affordable rates. Please note that fiverr deducts 20% as commission in our payments so the cost of domain and hosting will also include 20% extra fiverr fees.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create professional email accounts?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I will need access to cPanel or hosting manager account to create domain email accounts e.g. if your domain is example.com, the emails could be info@example.com etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you secure my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Definately! I will analyze drawbacks or loopholes and will fix them with multiple techniques and my experience

questionsAndAnswers.question: My website has responsiveness issues. Can you fix them?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I have multiple devices (mobile, tablets, iPad, laptops, LCDs) where I can test and fix responsivess issues of websites.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you create custom CMS?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I have created a number of user-friendly custom CMS with interactive UI components.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't like WordPress or Wix or Squarespace. Can you create a custom website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can create a custom website as per your needs. It needs to discuss so that I may select better tools and technologies for your website.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Includes static and responsive Bootstrap website built on HTML&CSS.

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Includes static PHP website with frontend as HTML. No database

packageList.title: Pro
packageList.description: A fully dynamic website including HTML, JavaScript, PHP and SQL

reviews.comment: As always, a pleasure to work with. Thank you again!
There is a reason i am a repeat client of Hamza - incredible to work with, fast responses, friendly and knowledgeable.
Really fast to respond and deliver the work. Thank you!
